duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide executive leadership and guidance to the organization’s HR operations, setting, enforcing, and evaluating legally compliant HR policies and procedures.
Identify and implement long-range strategic talent management goals.
Collaborate with executive leadership to define the organization’s long-term mission and goals, determining ways to support it through talent management.
Research, develop, and implement competitive compensation, benefits, performance appraisal, and employee incentive programs.
Maintain knowledge of employment laws, regulations, and best practices in HR and talent management.
Draft and implement the organization’s staffing budget and the budget for the HR department.
Participate in professional development and networking conferences and events.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree, preferably in human resource management or related field. Master’s degree, preferably in human resource management or related field, preferred.
